law.catch_line: Even though a determination of the Authority about financial assistance is subject to the Maryland P...
law.text:
Even though a determination of the Authority about financial assistance is subject to the Maryland Public Ethics Law, the existence of a conflict of interest or a violation of the Maryland Public Ethics Law does not affect:
the validity of a finding or determination made under this subtitle;
the enforceability of an agreement that the Authority makes under this subtitle; or
the validity or enforceability of a bond that the Authority issues.
